title: The Curious Snowflake: A Parable
description: What happens to a snowflake when it falls?To a snowflake, falling may be the scariest thing in the world, but the Curious Snowflake longs to know the truth. She travels throughout the Great Cloud, asking every snowflake she can what happens when they fall, and finds that, while everyone has ideas about it, none of them truly know.Then the Curious Snowflakes falls herself and discovers the truth is more wonderful than anyone imagined.A story of ideas, beliefs, and faith, The Curious Snowflake: A Parable is for anyone, young or old, who asks the big questions about life.“What do you think?”
author: James C. Struck
